entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
